name: WebGLRenderingContext.blendFuncSeparate
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.blendFuncSeparate() method of the WebGL API defines which function is used for blending pixel arithmetic for RGB and alpha components separately.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'blendFunc' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glBlendFunc' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
